faq.title: What is this?
faq.description:
_ENM Peer Support_ is a community service providing support to our peers going through the experience of opening a relationship.

It's a new idea we're trying, so the details of our engagement are up to you and us to figure out together: it could look like going on a walk for an hour and providing a space to ask questions, or a coffee shop date to vent and comfort, or a Zoom call, or some other format we haven't thought of yet!
